hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity Gap Reversion After News-Driven Spikes
hypothesis_content.statement: Following liquidity-focused news headlines (like Strategy Inc. or 'Structural Shift' articles), BTC/USDT order book depth will experience a temporary 15-30% reduction in the 1% depth metric, which will revert to pre-news levels within 2-4 hours as opportunistic market makers refill.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Recent news cycle creates reflexive selling from weak hands, but structural liquidity providers (market makers, institutions) have incentive to capture spread widening. The 'turbulence' narrative creates temporary dislocation.
entry_conditions: News sentiment score (crypto-specific NLP) drops below -0.4 with 'liquidity' keyword prominence
BTC 1% bid/ask depth (sum) drops >15% from 24hr rolling average within 30min of news

exit_conditions.take_profit: Depth metric returns to within 5% of pre-news rolling average

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Depth fails to revert within 4 hours in >40% of occurrences, or continues deteriorating systematically
